name: SANFORD HEALTH
sampleDescriptions: Policies affecting hospitals in P.L. 115-123, the Balanced Budget Act of 2018; proposals related to the 340B drug discount program; physician self referral; H.R.6, SUPPORT for Patients and Communities Act.
